entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 12:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -36.8°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
